summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to grant a permit to Lake Washington Turning & Scroll Works, a domestic corporation, to lay down, construct, operate and maintain a planked roadway and cable line on Charles Street, and Charles Street produced, from Thirty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-first Avenue, all in The City of Seattle, for the purpose of hauling the manufactured products of said corporation from its factory to an outlet on said Thirty-first Avenue, subject to certain terms and conditions.
